title: Is it possible to see different chats?
body:
I just entered a game and I've always thought the chats were pretty sync'd and everyone sees the same things...

I called mid before someone else but then they said he called it before I joined yet in the chat log I joined before him?

Can this happen? I feel like I was getting duped by a group or something.. Hope not I was about to give it to him thinking chat had messed up but someone dodged and I got mid next game :D

replies.body: they changed last year it so that all chats are now the same. RIP.
It is meant to be synced, but on occasion it still lags a bit for some players causing confusion.

I thinks this does happen when you join later than others its seriously annoying. At least they have made a delay so when to call at the same time the system will work out who actually posted first and give everyone the same order. But yea if you join late you may not see some of the chat
Man I'm really hurt.. I felt bad because they were all like "Whatever guess I'll fill" and then flaming me :(
